On January 29, the investor of the

Many machines and equipment for

A number of demolition works have been carried out. The

at about 1200 this afternoon in District 1,
Dak Lak province, a tanker truck carrying petroleum caught fire,
luckily no one was found.
Normally, at a time when the tanker truck was carrying
11,600 liters of gasoline from Cam Ranh port,
traveling in the direction of Khanh Hoa to Dak Lak,
reaching km 56 of the pass, it suddenly exploded
while going up the pass, causing the truck to flip over, causing a fire.  It
was reported that the

about 1 hour of effort,
the fire was completely extinguished at 13:00 on the same day,
causing no casualties.
